Save Our Internet

Tell Congress to stop the FCC from allowing Comcast, Verizon and AT&T to become the gatekeepers of the Internet.

People Who Have Signed

and 136,768 others...

Why Net Neutrality Matters

Preserving an open Internet is vital not to just to the free flow of information, but also to promoting innovation and economic productivity.
Todd Park, Former US Chief Technology Officer
To reach its full potential, the internet must remain a permissionless space for creativity, innovation and free expression.
Tim Berners-Lee, Inventor of the Web

Repealing Net Neutrality Allows

trending_down
Throttling

The slowing down of sites you visit and content you view

block
Censorship

ISP's could block any content, applications or websites

attach_money
Fees

Splitting the internet into packages - not just one price to access all sites
